name: Symphonic Code Analysis Demo
title: Symphonic Code Analysis Demo - Architecture Review & Stakeholder Approval
description: Demo and review gate for symphonic code analysis results. Presents analysis findings, metrics trends, and architectural conformity to stakeholders for review and approval before publication.
purpose: Enable architecture review teams to validate code analysis results, discuss findings, review recommendations, and approve metrics before they're used for governance enforcement.
trigger: Code analysis pipeline completion, sprint review, or explicit stakeholder invocation

policies: All analysis results must be reviewed by at least one architect before approval
Trend analysis must show improvement or stability (no regression)
Critical findings must be addressed before approval
Demo must document stakeholder feedback and decisions
Approved metrics become the baseline for next cycle governance
Demo artifacts must be generated and archived for audit trail

handlers.name: Present Analysis Results
handlers.description: Display code analysis metrics, coverage data, and complexity scoring from the symphonic code analysis pipeline

handlers.name: Review Metrics Trends
handlers.description: Analyze trend data over time, compare against baseline, identify improvements or regressions

handlers.name: Discuss Findings
handlers.description: Facilitate stakeholder discussion of critical findings, root causes, and implications

handlers.name: Approve Metrics & Recommendations
handlers.description: Obtain stakeholder approval of analysis results and recommendations for next governance cycle

handlers.name: Generate Demo Artifacts
handlers.description: Create JSON and markdown artifacts documenting demo results, stakeholder decisions, and approval status for audit trail
